sp_rel_widget_clone.payload: otherc.instance-display-text{ padding:2px; } .survey-panel-spacer{ margin : 24px; } .survey-title { font-weight: bold; } .survey-title a { color:black; } .card-bottom { margin-top:9px; } .progress-bar, .progress-bar-inner { width:100%; height:9px; border-radius:4px; } .progress-bar { background:#BDC3C7; margin-top:5px; } .progress-bar-inner { background:#278efc; } sp_instancefalsesurveysfalseMy Surveys[{"name":"maxRecords","section":"Presentation","label":"Max Records","type":"integer"},{"name":"widgetTitle","section":"Presentation","label":"Title of the Widget","type":"string"}]falsefalsesp_widgetadmin2016-05-26 21:09:1704b1cc07c3231200e44574e1c1d3ae96175My Surveys67ac5062db10220035417878f0b8f5c467ac5062db10220035417878f0b8f5c4sp_widget_04b1cc07c3231200e44574e1c1d3ae96admin2019-10-02 21:28:28

sys_update_version.name: sp_rel_widget_clone_6eb7100d1b027c10a0cc20662a4bcb4c
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_rel_widget_clone"><sp_rel_widget_clone action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><child display_value="Copy of My Surveys">6ab794c91b027c10a0cc20662a4bcb68</child><cloned>2021-08-16 13:55:05</cloned><last_validated>2021-08-16 13:55:05</last_validated><parent display_value="My Surveys">04b1cc07c3231200e44574e1c1d3ae96</parent><payload><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><sp_widget><category>other</category><client_script><![CDATA[function($rootScope,$timeout) {
  // widget controller
  var c = this;
	var bc = [{label: c.data.widgetTitle, url: '#'}];
	$timeout(function() {
		$rootScope.$broadcast('sp.update.breadcrumbs', bc);
	});
}]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css>.instance-display-text{&#13;
  padding:2px;&#13;
}&#13;
&#13;
.survey-panel-spacer{&#13;
  margin : 24px;&#13;
}&#13;
&#13;
.survey-title {&#13;
  font-weight: bold;&#13;
}&#13;
&#13;
.survey-title a {&#13;
  color:black;&#13;
}&#13;
&#13;
.card-bottom {&#13;
  margin-top:9px;&#13;
}&#13;
&#13;
.progress-bar, .progress-bar-inner {&#13;
  width:100%;&#13;
  height:9px;&#13;
  border-radius:4px;&#13;
}&#13;
&#13;
.progress-bar {&#13;
  background:#BDC3C7;&#13;
  margin-top:5px;&#13;
}&#13;
&#13;
.progress-bar-inner {&#13;
  background:#278efc;&#13;
}&#13;
</css><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description/><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>false</has_preview><id>surveys</id><internal>false</internal><link/><name>My Surveys</name><option_schema>[{"name":"maxRecords","section":"Presentation","label":"Max Records","type":"integer"},{"name":"widgetTitle","section":"Presentation","label":"Title of the Widget","type":"string"}]</option_schema><public>false</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[(function() {
  // populate the 'data' object
  // e.g., data.table = $sp.getValue('table');
	data.maxRecords = options.maxRecords || 5;
	var sp = new SPSurveyAPI();
	options.showAll = $sp.getParameter('id') == 'my_surveys';
	if($sp.getParameter('id') != 'my_surveys'){
		if(options.widgetTitle && options.widgetTitle.length>0){
			data.widgetTitle = options.widgetTitle;
		}else{
			data.widgetTitle = gs.getMessage("My Surveys");
		}
		data.encodedWidgetTitle = encodeURIComponent(data.widgetTitle);
	} else{
		data.widgetTitle = $sp.getParameter('title') || gs.getMessage("Surveys");
	}
	
	sp.getSurveys(data.maxRecords, options.showAll, data);
	data.instances.forEach(function(instance) {
		if (!!instance.description)
			instance.description = $sp.stripHTML(instance.description);
	});

})();]]></script><servicenow>false</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-05-26 21:09:17</sys_created_on><sys_id>04b1cc07c3231200e44574e1c1d3ae96</sys_id><sys_mod_count>175</sys_mod_count><sys_name>My Surveys</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Service Portal Surveys" source="sn_portal_surveys">67ac5062db10220035417878f0b8f5c4</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Service Portal Surveys">67ac5062db10220035417878f0b8f5c4</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_04b1cc07c3231200e44574e1c1d3ae96</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-10-02 21:28:28</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<div ng-if="!(options.showAll && options.showAll != 'false' && data.instances.length && data.totalRecords == data.maxRecords && data.totalRecords != 0)">
	<div class="panel panel-{{::options.color}} b">
		<div class="panel-heading">
			<h4 class="panel-title"><fa ng-if="::options.glyph.length" name="{{::options.glyph}}" class="m-r-sm" />{{::data.widgetTitle}}</h4>
		</div>
			<div class="list-group" ng-if="data.instances.length && data.totalRecords > 0">
				<div class="list-group-item" ng-repeat="instance in data.instances track by $index">
					<div>
						<a href="?id=take_survey&instance_id={{::instance.sys_id}}" title = "Take {{::instance.evaluation_method_display}}">
                          <table><tr>
                          <td><span  class = "survey-icon icon-article-document"
                                  ng-if="(instance.evaluation_method == 'assessment' || instance.evaluation_method == 'attestation_v2' || instance.evaluation_method == 'risk_assessment')"></span>
                            <span ng-if="(instance.evaluation_method == 'survey' || instance.evaluation_method == 'quiz')" class="survey-icon icon-form"></span></td>
                          <td class="instance-display-text">{{::instance.display}}</td></tr></table>
                      </a>
					</div>
					<div>
						<small ng-if="instance.trigger_id">
							<a style="color:inherit;text-decoration:underline" href="?id=ticket&table={{::instance.trigger_table}}&sys_id={{::instance.trigger_id}}">{{::instance.trigger_display}}</a>
							<span> â€¢ </span>
						</small>
						<small>
							<span>{{::instance.due_display}}</span>
						</small>
					</div>

				</div>
			</div>
			<div ng-if="data.totalRecords ==0" class="panel-body ng-scope">
				${You have no surveys to take}
			</div>
			<div class="panel-footer" ng-if="data.totalRecords > data.maxRecords">
				<h4 class="panel-title row">
					<div class="col-xs-6">
						<span>{{::data.recordsShownMsg}}</span>
					</div>
					<div class="col-xs-6 text-right">
						<a href="?id=my_surveys&title={{::data.encodedWidgetTitle}}">${View all}</a>
					</div>
			 	</h4>
			</div>
	</div>
</div>

<div ng-if="options.showAll && options.showAll != 'false' && data.instances.length && data.totalRecords == data.maxRecords && data.totalRecords != 0">
  <div class = "survey-panel-spacer"/>
  <h2>{{::data.widgetTitle}}</h2>
  <div class="row">
    <div class="col-sm-6 col-md-4 wrapper-xs" ng-repeat="instance in data.instances track by $index">
      <div class="panel panel-default wrapper-sm">

        <div class="row">
          <div class="col-xs-12 survey-title" style="height:20px;text-overflow:ellipsis;overflow:hidden;white-space:nowrap">
            <a href="?id=take_survey&instance_id={{::instance.sys_id}}" title = "Take {{::instance.evaluation_method_display}}">
                          <table><tr>
                          <td><span  class = "survey-icon icon-article-document"
                                  ng-if="(instance.evaluation_method == 'assessment' || instance.evaluation_method == 'attestation_v2' || instance.evaluation_method == 'risk_assessment')"></span>
                            <span ng-if="(instance.evaluation_method == 'survey' || instance.evaluation_method == 'quiz')" class="survey-icon icon-form"></span></td>
                          <td class="instance-display-text">{{::instance.display}}</td></tr></table>
          </a>    
          </div>
          <div class="col-xs-12" ng-if="instance.trigger_description" style="height:20px;text-overflow:ellipsis;overflow:hidden;white-space:nowrap">
            {{::instance.trigger_description}}
          </div>
          <div class="col-xs-12" ng-if="!instance.trigger_description" style="height:20px;text-overflow:ellipsis;overflow:hidden;white-space:nowrap">
            {{::instance.description}}
          </div>
        </div>

        <div class="card-bottom" style="font-size:12px;">

          <div class="row">
            <div class="col-xs-8" style="height:17px;">
							<span ng-if="instance.can_retake">${Completed. Do you want to retake?}</span>
            </div>
            <div class="col-xs-4 text-right" style="height:17px">
              <a  ng-if="instance.trigger_table_display" href="?id=ticket&table={{::instance.trigger_table}}&sys_id={{::instance.trigger_id}}">{{::instance.trigger_display}}</a>
            </div>
          </div>

          <div class="row">
            <div class="col-xs-8">
              <div class="progress-bar" ng-if="instance.percent_answered > '0'">
                <div class="progress-bar-inner" ng-style="{width: instance.percent_answered + '%'}"></div>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-xs-4 text-right">
              <div class="due-date">{{::instance.due_display}}</div>
            </div>
          </div>

        </div> <!-- end div.card-bottom -->

      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>]]></template></sp_widget></payload><sys_class_name>sp_rel_widget_clone</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>imada.satoshi</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-16 13:55:05</sys_created_on><sys_id>6eb7100d1b027c10a0cc20662a4bcb4c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>6ab794c91b027c10a0cc20662a4bcb68</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Now Agri" source="x_snc_now_agri">8fe7b9f0db46bc102f00152b13961926</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Now Agri">8fe7b9f0db46bc102f00152b13961926</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_rel_widget_clone_6eb7100d1b027c10a0cc20662a4bcb4c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>imada.satoshi</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-08-16 13:55:05</sys_updated_on></sp_rel_widget_clone></record_update>
